content:
Here is a table of all the motions presented by Giorgio Mammoliti during the year 2004:

| Type of Motion | Motion | Month, Year | Vote Result | Times Presented | Summary |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Public Safety | Motion to Request the Province to Increase Fines for Speeding | January, 2004 | Not passed, vote 9-31 | 3rd time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to request the province to increase fines for speeding to improve traffic safety. |
| Housing | Motion to Request the Province to Provide Funding for Affordable Housing | February, 2004 | Not passed, vote 17-22 | 3rd time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to request the province to provide funding for affordable housing in Toronto to address homelessness and the lack of affordable housing. |
| Community Support | Motion to Provide Funding for Black History Month Celebrations | February, 2004 | Not passed, vote 6-33 | 1st time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to provide funding for Black History Month celebrations to support diversity and cultural awareness. |
| Public Safety | Motion to Request the Province to Toughen Laws for Street Racing | April, 2004 | Not passed, vote 12-23 | 3rd time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to request the province to toughen laws for street racing to improve public safety. |
| Public Safety | Motion to Install a Traffic Signal on Jane Street | May, 2004 | Passed unanimously | 1st time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to install a traffic signal on Jane Street to improve traffic safety. |
| Housing | Motion to Request the Province to Provide Funding for Affordable Housing | June, 2004 | Not passed, vote 15-22 | 4th time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to request the province to provide funding for affordable housing in Toronto to address homelessness and the lack of affordable housing. |
| Public Safety | Motion to Increase the Number of Police Officers in Ward 7 | September, 2004 | Not passed, vote 10-30 | 4th time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to increase the number of police officers in his ward to improve public safety. |
| Culture and Sports | Motion to Request the Province to Provide Funding for the Hockey Hall of Fame | November, 2004 | Not passed, vote 14-19 | 1st time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to request the province to provide funding for the Hockey Hall of Fame in Toronto to support tourism and the local economy. |
| Public Safety | Motion to Request the Province to Increase Fines for Speeding | December, 2004 | Not passed, vote 10-33 | 4th time presented | Giorgio Mammoliti proposed to request the province to increase fines for speeding to improve traffic safety. |

I hope this table provides the information you were looking for. Let me know if you have any further questions.
